entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
